ygData.subject: RE: Our limbo letter...
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t worry... he will.  It takes him a long time to do it though (assume a month or so). Desmei Sightblinder Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
ygData.messageBody:
Don't worry... he will. It takes him a long time to do it though (assume a
month or so).

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
